metadata.title: Agustin Zamar | Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Full Stack Developer specializing in Laravel, React, Next.js, and modern web technologies. Based in Salta, Argentina.

about.heading: Building digital products that make a difference
about.bio1: I'm a Full Stack Developer based in Salta, Argentina, with 5+ years of experience architecting and building production-ready web applications. Starting as a QA Analyst gave me a unique appreciation for writing clean, testable, and user-focused code from day one.
about.bio2: Today, I specialize in creating modern web solutions using Laravel, React, and Next.js. I thrive on challenging projects that demand both technical expertise and creative problem-solving, turning complex requirements into elegant, scalable applications.

experience.heading: My Professional Journey
experience.description: From quality assurance to full stack development — here's how I evolved into the developer I am today

highlights: Architected and developed production web applications using Laravel and React
Designed and implemented REST APIs serving thousands of requests daily
Built responsive frontend components with modern CSS frameworks
Managed relational databases including MySQL, SQL Server, and SQLite
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions for automated deployments
Collaborated directly with clients from initial requirements to final delivery
Developed backend features using Laravel for enterprise clients
Built frontend interfaces with React and Next.js
Designed and integrated REST APIs across Laravel microservices architecture
Contributed to an API Gateway implementation using AWS SAM
Collaborated in Agile Scrum teams with daily standups and code reviews
Delivered custom web solutions for multiple clients across industries
Built full-stack applications using Laravel and React from scratch
Created and maintained RESTful APIs with comprehensive documentation
Implemented responsive designs with Tailwind CSS and modern frameworks
Managed project timelines and maintained clear client communications
Deployed applications to cloud infrastructure with monitoring
Developed web applications using Laravel, React and TypeScript
Enhanced e-commerce platforms built with Magento
Refactored legacy systems using Symfony for improved maintainability
Integrated external shipment tracking REST APIs
Developed features for internal backoffice applications
Utilized Git, GitHub, GitLab and Jenkins CI/CD pipelines
Worked effectively under Agile methodologies
Designed and executed comprehensive test plans including functional, regression and integration testing
Created automated test suites using Selenium and Cypress
Performed cross-browser and cross-platform compatibility testing
Tracked and managed issues using JIRA and Bugzilla
Collaborated closely with developers in Agile teams
